articles.description: Riot Games found another game trying to copy its popular title.
articles.content: Riot Games is reportedly suing Vietnamese video game studio Imba Network for allegedly copying its League of Legends-inspired autobattler Teamfight Tactics, according to a lawsuit filed this past Thu… [+1379 chars]
